purpose: The email is a call for proposals for satellite events to complement the main conferences of ETAPS 2026, which will be held in Torino, Italy, from April 11 to 16, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit their proposals by June 26, 2025, and outlines the expectations and arrangements for these satellite events. The email also provides details on the submission process and important dates.
evidence_sentences: The ETAPS 2026 organizing committee invites proposals for satellite events (e.g., workshops) to complement the main conferences.
Deadline for proposals of satellite events: June 26, 2025
Researchers and practitioners wishing to organize a satellite event are invited to submit their proposal to the Satellite Events Chairs.
